note:
A developer on loc.gov & loc.gov API; interests include Greek & Latin, web archiving, poetry, drama, DH, DevOps, infosec, Unicode. Opinions != employers'. The worst case scenario is _always_ the collapse of the false vacuum.

Alt: Profile picture: a black-and-white photograph of me as an infant, smiling with my hands up at my side almost as in a shrug. Banner: the dome of the US Capitol at night, with a red streetlight in the foreground and two decorative lights in the foreground left.
